scripts.bm: browserify src/ts/app.ts -x lodash -x moment -x angular -x angular-route -p [ tsify -m commonjs -t ES5 --noImplicitAny ] -t browserify-ngannotate -o src/bundle.js
scripts.bme: browserify src/ts/app.ts --bundleExternal -p [ tsify -m commonjs -t ES5 --noImplicitAny ] -o src/bundle.js
scripts.bv: browserify -r lodash -r moment -r angular -r angular-route -o src/vendor.js
